topics.body:
Hey guys I just wanted to ask, what was the total rating of the Marvel Civil War? I heard it got a mixed reception of how every character acted, and also the fact that Iron Man was considered a huge asshole for what he did. I mean I read it, well most of it, I'm certain I may have missed a few things, but it does have my interest as to why everything turned out the way it did. 

Also it seems kinda well bad for an ending, I mean writing wise, the whole way it ended seemed a tad of a let down. 

Is the film going to be anything like the comics?
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6
